scripts.lint: node_modules/.bin/coffeelint -f smc-util/coffeelint.json -c *.coffee && cd smc-hub && npm run lint && cd ../smc-webapp && npm run lint && cd ../smc-util && npm run lint && cd ../smc-util-node && npm run lint
scripts.test: export SMC_TEST=true&& cd smc-util && npm test && cd ../smc-util-node && npm test && cd ../smc-hub && npm test && cd ../smc-webapp && npm test && cd ../smc-project && npm test
scripts.coverage: cd smc-util && npm run coverage && cd ../smc-util-node && npm run coverage && cd ../smc-hub && npm run coverage && cd ../smc-webapp && npm run coverage
scripts.webpack-watch: cd $SALVUS_ROOT; scripts/update_color_scheme.coffee; webapp-lib/primus/update_primus; SOURCE_MAP=true NODE_ENV=development webpack --debug --output-pathinfo --progress --colors --watch
scripts.webpack-debug: cd $SALVUS_ROOT; scripts/update_color_scheme.coffee; webapp-lib/primus/update_primus; SOURCE_MAP=true NODE_ENV=development webpack --debug --progress --colors
scripts.webpack-static: cd $SALVUS_ROOT; scripts/update_color_scheme.coffee; scripts/update_react_static && CC_STATICPAGES=true NODE_ENV=development webpack --debug --output-pathinfo --progress --colors
scripts.clean: find $SMC_ROOT -type d -name node_modules | xargs rm -rf; rm -rf $SMC_ROOT/static
